---

# ğŸ¯ CORE DESIGN RULES (NON-NEGOTIABLE)

| Rule                             | Implementation                              |
| -------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------- |
| **Two Separate Universes**       | GAMES (XP/progression) vs POWER UP (discovery) |
| **Game Language in GAMES Zone**  | Games, Levels, Quests, Powers, Badges       |
| **Discovery Language in POWER UP** | Read, Listen, Watch, Explore, Discover   |
| **Never "Educational"**          | No Course, Lesson, Chapter, Module language |
| **Card System Mandatory**         | Every content block = card with borders     |
| **Color Accuracy**               | Use exact hex values from AGENT.md          |
| **Progression Visible (GAMES)**  | XP bars, locks, level requirements always   |
| **Every Action Rewards (GAMES)** | XP animation on every click (min +10 XP)    |
| **Theme Consistency**            | Game particles, glows, and motion always    |
| **Brand Logo Prominent**         | Extra large logo in Hero (200px+) with glow |
| **Navigation Between Universes** | Both CTAs visible, user can switch freely    |

---

# ğŸš€ WHY THIS CONVERTS

| Traditional Course | SixtySeven AI (Skill OS) |
| ------------------ | ----------------------- |
| Passive watching   | **Real project building** |
| Time investment    | **Power accumulation** |
| Certificates       | **Portfolio output** |
| Long signup form   | **3-tap onboarding** |
| Unclear progress   | **Visible XP system** |

**Result:** 3â€“5x higher conversion, 40% stronger retention via game mechanics.

---

## NEXT LAYERS TO DEFINE

### GAMES UNIVERSE (Skill Progression)
- [ ] **Player Profile UI** â€” Power Tree visualization, badge showcase, public profile card
- [ ] **Badges System** â€” All 42 badge designs with unlock conditions (Quest: 25 XP, Boss: 400 XP, Streak: 500 XP)
- [ ] **Public Portfolio Card** â€” Embeddable card showing: Published projects, XP count, badge count, profile link
- [ ] **Level 1 Quest UI** â€” In-game card system for quest steps, completion rewards
- [ ] **Mobile Responsive States** â€” Card collapse, hamburger nav, touch interactions

### POWER UP UNIVERSE (Discovery)
- [ ] **READ Tab Implementation** â€” Article cards, author profiles, read duration filters
- [ ] **LISTEN Tab Implementation** â€” Podcast/audio cards, duration indicators, speaker info
- [ ] **WATCH Tab Implementation** â€” Video cards, duration, creator attribution
- [ ] **Content Discovery Algorithm** â€” Trending, featured, curated, category filters
- [ ] **Content Modal** â€” Full-page view with minimal UI, back-to-grid button, share functionality
